modName: Hroki the Fence and Skooma Dealer
summary: Makes Hroki in Markarth a Fence and a Skooma Dealer.
descriptionHtml:
Makes Hroki in Markarth a Fence and a Skooma Dealer.  Also sells moon sugar and variety of poison.  She has the alternative thieves guild armor equipped.  

Requires:  ApachiiSkyHair for her hair to work.  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?
author: Samuel Tyson
